author: .paulharris
content: did anyone look at the slashings? we've got 24095 active_slashed validators atm despite good counts of slashings per epoch, i wonder if we're basically only slashing 1 validator or a very small number, per slashing, becuase we're not really getting slashings faster than exits

author: .paulharris
content:
so we're getting a really awful rate of slashing. I think slashers are running, we just dont do well at making good slashings
most slashings have a tiny number of validators in them (1-2) and we're only slashing in about 8 blocks per epoch so we're barely exceeding the exit rate wiht the slashing rate. 
our mass slashing event will take months probably

Part of it is probably that most of the slashers aren't on, i do wonder if we get any different slashers running and see if theres better data coming through on that, if we're not going to get to 66%
